Text: Se uploaddi come anonymous ti becchi solo valutazioni negative.

io uploado come cavolo mi pare e piace.. se hai problemi vai a scaricare altrove.
Ma tu guarda che gente -.-'

This is great but you should not post things that require forign language and a specialized network to access information about the details of the download. I am assuming from the two downloads, one is the main game and the other is an addon pack that makes the game into the gold version, however how this is done may be a complete mystery considering I would need to install access to a specialized network to see info readme's about your download without starting to download the item itself.
